      19               1 : define( 'OXARTICLE_LINKTYPE_VENDOR', 1 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      20               1 : define( 'OXARTICLE_LINKTYPE_MANUFACTURER', 2 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      21               1 : define( 'OXARTICLE_LINKTYPE_PRICECATEGORY', 3 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      22               1 : define( 'OXARTICLE_LINKTYPE_TAG', 4 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      23               1 : define( 'OXARTICLE_LINKTYPE_RECOMM', 5 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      24                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      25                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      26                 :  * Article manager.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      27                 :  * Creates fully detailed article object, with such information as VAT,                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      28                 :  * discounts, etc.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      29                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      30                 :  * @package model                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      31                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      32               1 : class oxArticle extends oxI18n implements oxIArticle, oxIUrl                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      33                 : {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      34                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      35                 :      * Current class name                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      36                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      37                 :      * @var string                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      38                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      39                 :     protected $_sClassName = 'oxarticle';                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      40                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      41                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      42                 :      * Set $_blUseLazyLoading to true if you want to load only actually used fields not full object, depending on views.                                                                                                                                                                    
      43                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      44                 :      * @var bool                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      45                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      46                 :     protected $_blUseLazyLoading = true;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      47                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      48                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      49                 :      * item key the usage with oxuserbasketitem                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      50                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      51                 :      * @var string (md5 hash)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      52                 :      */

     554                 :     public function getStockCheckQuery( $blForceCoreTable = null )                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
     555                 :     {

     561                 :         //do not check for variants

     563               0 :             $sQ = " and ( $sTable.oxstockflag != 2 or ( $sTable.oxstock + $sTable.oxvarstock ) > 0  ) ";

    1056                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    1057                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    1058                 :      * Loads object data from DB (object data ID must be passed to method).                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
    1059                 :      * Converts dates (oxarticle::oxarticles__oxinsert)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    1060                 :      * to international format (oxutils.php oxRegistry::get("oxUtilsDate")->formatDBDate(...)).

    1211                 :     public function addToRatingAverage( $iRating )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    1212                 :     {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    1213               0 :         $dOldRating = $this->oxarticles__oxrating->value;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    1214               0 :         $dOldCnt    = $this->oxarticles__oxratingcnt->value;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    1215               0 :         $this->oxarticles__oxrating->setValue(( $dOldRating * $dOldCnt + $iRating ) / ($dOldCnt + 1));                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1216               0 :         $this->oxarticles__oxratingcnt->setValue($dOldCnt + 1);                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    1217               0 :         $dRating = ( $dOldRating * $dOldCnt + $iRating ) / ($dOldCnt + 1);                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1218               0 :         $dRatingCnt = (int) ($dOldCnt + 1);                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
    1219                 :         // oxarticles.oxtimestamp = oxarticles.oxtimestamp to keep old timestamp value                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1220               0 :         $oDb = oxDb::getDb();                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    1221               0 :         $oDb->execute( 'update oxarticles set oxarticles.oxrating = '.$dRating.',oxarticles.oxratingcnt = '.$dRatingCnt.', oxarticles.oxtimestamp = oxarticles.oxtimestamp where oxarticles.oxid = '.$oDb->quote( $this->getId() ) );                                                       
    1222                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    1223               0 :             $this->_updateSelfDependency();                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
    1224               0 :     }

    1368                 :

    1371               0 :         $this->_getAttribsString($sAttribs, $iCnt);                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1372                 :

    1375                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    1376                 :

    1936                 :     /**

    1943                 :     public function getVendorId( $blForceReload = false )

    1950                 :                 }

    2219                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2220                 :      * Calculates price of article (adds taxes, currency and discounts).                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2221                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2222                 :      * @param oxPrice $oPrice price object                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2223                 :      * @param double  $dVat   vat value, optional, if passed, bypasses "bl_perfCalcVatOnlyForBasketOrder" config value

    2225                 :      * @return oxPrice                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2226                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2227                 :     protected function _calculatePrice( $oPrice, $dVat = null )                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2228                 :     {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    2229                 :         // apply VAT only if configuration requires it                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2230               0 :         if ( isset( $dVat ) || !$this->getConfig()->getConfigParam( 'bl_perfCalcVatOnlyForBasketOrder' ) ) {

    2232               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    2233                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2234                 :         // apply currency                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    2235               0 :         $this->_applyCurrency( $oPrice );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    2236                 :         // apply discounts                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2237               0 :         if ( !$this->skipDiscounts() ) {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2238               0 :             $oDiscountList = oxRegistry::get("oxDiscountList");                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2239               0 :             $aDiscounts = $oDiscountList->getArticleDiscounts( $this, $this->getArticleUser() );                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2240                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2241               0 :             reset( $aDiscounts );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    2242               0 :             foreach ( $aDiscounts as $oDiscount ) {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2243               0 :                 $oPrice->setDiscount($oDiscount->getAddSum(), $oDiscount->getAddSumType());                                                                                                                                                                                                 
    2244               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    2245               0 :             $oPrice->calculateDiscount();                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    2246               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    2247                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    2248               0 :         return $oPrice;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2249                 :     }

    2552                 :     /**

    4017                 :     protected function _getAmountPriceList()

    4022                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4023                 :                 //collecting assigned to article amount-price list                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    4024               0 :                 $oAmPriceList = oxNew( 'oxAmountPricelist' );                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    4025               0 :                 $oAmPriceList->load( $this );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    4026                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4027                 :                 // prepare abs prices if currently having percentages                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4028               0 :                 $oBasePrice = $this->_getGroupPrice();

    4660                 :                     MAX( IF( `oxarticles`.`oxprice` > 0, `oxarticles`.`oxprice`, `p`.`oxprice` ) ) AS `varmaxprice`

    4872                 :     /**

    4879                 :     protected function _applyRangePrice()                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    4880                 :     {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4881                 :         //#buglist_413 if bl_perfLoadPriceForAddList variant price shouldn't be loaded too

    4883               0 :             return;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4884                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    4885                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4886               0 :         $this->_blIsRangePrice = false;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    4887                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4888                 :         // if parent is buyable - do not apply range price calcculations                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    4889               0 :         if ($this->_blSkipFromPrice || !$this->_blNotBuyableParent) {                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    4890               0 :             return;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    4891                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    4892                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4893               0 :         if ( $this->isParentNotBuyable() && !$this->getConfig()->getConfigParam( 'blLoadVariants' )) {                                                                                                                                                                                      
    4894                 :                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    4895               0 :             $dPrice = $this->_preparePrice( $this->oxarticles__oxvarminprice->value, $this->getArticleVat() );                                                                                                                                                                              
    4896                 :                 // Mall price
